articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Party and State Leaders
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, received a message of greeting from Xi Zinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and Zhang Dejiang, chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC, on Sept. 8.
					 The message said:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations and good wishes to you and, through you, to the Workers' Party of Korea and the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese government and people on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 Over the past 67 years after the founding of the DPRK, the Korean people have steadily registered fresh successes in the socialist revolution and construction under the leadership of Comrade Kim Il Sung, Comrade Kim Jong Il and Comrade Kim Jong Un and the WPK.
					
					 We are rejoiced over this and sincerely wish that the DPRK will make fresh development in all its future works.
					
					 China and the DPRK are linked by the same mountain and rivers and the traditional China-DPRK friendship is a precious treasure of both sides personally provided and cultivated by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries.
					
					 Under the fresh situation we will join the DPRK side to promote a protracted, sound and stable development of the China-DPRK relations, steadily consolidate the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and thus make a positive contribution to peace, stability and development in the region.
					
					 We wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from President of the Russian Federation V. Putin on Wednesday. 
					 The Russian president extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					
					 He noted that the bilateral relations based on the fine tradition of friendship and good neighborliness are developing in the constructive direction. 
					
					 He expressed the belief that the mutually beneficial bilateral cooperation will develop in all fields thanks to the common efforts of the two countries in the future, too. 
					
					 This will be in full line with the fundamental interests of the peoples of the two countries and will contribute to promoting security and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the whole of Northeast Asia, the message said. 
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and success and all the people of the DPRK welfare and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Wednesday received a message of greeting from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State of Cuba.
					 The message extended warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the national day of the DPRK. 
					
					 It sent fraternal salute to him.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Wednesday received a message of greeting from Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas. 
					 In the message the Palestinian president said he was pleased to extend sincere congratulations and wishes to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the friendly government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the state and people of Palestine and on his own behalf on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un and the DPRK and its people steady stability and prosperity. 
					
					 He expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for paying attention to the just cause and legitimate struggle of the Palestinian people to put an end to the occupation and build an independent state with Eastern Kuds as its capital where security and peace are ensured and sending firm support and solidarity to them. 
					
					 He hoped that Kim Jong Un would enjoy good health and happiness and the historic relations of friendship between the two countries and two peoples would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Belarusian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Belarusian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Wednesday received a message of greeting from Belarusian President Aleksandr Lukashenko.
					 The president extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the Belarusian people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK, the national holiday.
					
					 He expressed belief that the beneficial cooperation between the two countries would successfully expand and the traditional bilateral relations of friendship would develop in the future.
					
					 Sending highest regard to Kim Jong Un, the president wished him good health and success in his work for peace and wellbeing of the people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Martyrs' Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Martyrs' Cemeteries 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery Wednesday, the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Wreaths sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un were seen standing before the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in the city took part in the wreath-laying ceremonies.
					
					 Wreaths were placed before the wreath-laying stand of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong in the joint name of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet. A wreath was laid before the wreath-laying stand of the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in the joint name of the C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet. A wreath in the joint name of the C.C., the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission was placed before the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Laid there were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, scientific, educational, public health, literary and arts and media institutions, and party and power bodies, institutions, factories and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of martyrs.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A reception took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday, the 67th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the armed forces bodies, the  Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, former unconverted long-term prisoners, heroes and persons of merits.
					
					 Also present there were overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their wives and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a speech. 
					
					 He said that the history of the DPRK is a great and proud history in which the Korean people have won only victories in the defense of the country, socialist construction, confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. that has lasted for several decades and the building of a thriving socialist nation under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a political and ideological power of single-minded unity, the world's military power and the power of the youth without an equal in the world and advancing full of confidence toward beautiful future where all dreams and ideals of the people will come true as it is holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem, the speaker noted.
					
					 He underlined the need to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal leaders of the country and revolution in high esteem and dynamically advance to accelerate the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche along the road of independence, Songun and socialism opened up by them.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Wednesday, the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party and the state, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and officials of the party and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 In the halls where the great leaders lie in state the visitors paid homage to them in humblest reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here, a congratulatory group of the Koreans in Japan for marking the 67th birthday of the DPRK, foreign guests and overseas compatriots visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Wednesday, the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					 They paid tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 At the halls where the great leaders lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and schoolchildren visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il Wednesday, the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 A floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un was seen standing before their statues on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before them in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, enterprises, farms and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 A floral basket was laid there in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Visitors made bows to the statues.
					
					 Floral baskets were also laid before their statues at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio and portraits of the smiling great leaders in various other places of the city in the name of units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions and enterprises.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and schoolchildren across the country also visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas.

articles.title: Public Presentation by Winners of Schoolchildren's Art Individual Contest Held
articles.content:
Public Presentation by Winners of Schoolchildren's Art Individual Contest Held
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A public presentation by winners of the 10th schoolchildren's art individual contest took place at the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Wednesday, the 67th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Put on the stage were male solo "Life of Generalissimo Was Totally Dedicated to My Country," harmonica ensemble "For Revolution", violin solo "If Our Mother Smiles Once" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by turning the DPRK, once eclipsed in the international arena, into an invincible power and laid the foundation for its eternal prosperity.
					
					 The public presentation clearly represented the faith and will of the successors to the revolution.
					
					 Among the audience were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, and its officials, officials concerned and schoolchildren.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held by Youth and Students
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held by Youth and Students
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties were held by youth and students in Pyongyang and other parts of the country Wednesday, the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The venues of the dancing parties in Pyongyang including the plazas of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph turned into seas of dancers when the song "Fortune of Korea" was played.
					
					 The youth and students enthusiastically danced, expressing boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who built the genuine country of the people, a new society, on this land with their Juche-oriented idea of nation-building and through gigantic revolutionary practices and glorified it as a socialist power demonstrating its dignity of being independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 They cheerfully danced to the tune of songs "Youth and Courage", "Dash ahead toward Future", "Hullari", etc.
					
					 The dancing parties that ended with the song "March of Korean Youth" fully demonstrated the firm will of the Songun young vanguard to dynamically advance toward the final victory of the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in the seats of all provinces, cities, counties.

articles.title: Art Performances Given to Mark DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Art Performances Given to Mark DPRK's Birthday
 Pyongyang September 9 (KCNA) -- Performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas to celebrate the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The revolutionary drama "A Letter from a Daughter" was given at the National Theatre.
					
					 The National Circus gave a circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Such colorful numbers as physical acrobatics "Double Swing Flight" pleased working people, youths and schoolchildren.
					
					 Artistes of the North Phyongan Provincial Art Troupe and the Provincial Art Squad and teachers and students of the universities in the province gave a performance at the Provincial Art Theater.
					
					 In such numbers as female small chorus "Mine Is Always the Country of the Leader" and female solo "Tell, O Road of Songun", the performers presented the people's boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Teachers and students of the February 16 Kanggye College of Arts put on the stage a performance "Our Country Shines under the Leadership of Marshal".
					
					 Artistes in North Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces presented the appearance of the country and happy future, boosting the revolutionary enthusiasm and fighting spirit of the working people.
					
					 Performances given across the country showed well the firm will of the Korean people to build the most powerful country and people's paradise on this land.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Wednesday, the 67th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The seven decades since the day of history when the DPRK's flag fluttered in the sky above the country is a history of gigantic struggle and changes in which the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il set a worldwide example in building a socialist state with their gifted wisdom and unremitting efforts and a proud history in which they successfully realized the centuries-old ideal and desire of the popular masses, the message said.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan could firmly protect the dignity of the nation, enjoy a worthy life and set an example in the world movement of overseas compatriots in an alien land far away from the homeland as there is the socialist country built and led by the Generalissimos to be an invincible power, it noted.
					
					 The undying feats of the Generalissimos and their loving care shown for Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are shedding more brilliant rays and their revolutionary careers are given a steady continuity as the history of the great sun thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, it said.
					
					 Chongryon will unconditionally implement his highly important letter, usher in a new heyday of Chongryon for the happiness of the compatriots and the future of the rising generation and create a new spirit and new appearance of the movement of Koreans in Japan advancing full of dynamism, it concluded.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Tajik President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Tajik President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Emomali Rahmon, president of Tajikistan, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished the Tajik president success in his responsible work for the country's development and the Tajik people peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Suppressing Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Suppressing Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Hokkaido police authorities of Japan on Sept. 6 unhesitatingly hurled tens of hooligans into operations to search Korean primary, middle and high school in Hokkaido, the Hokkaido Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and institutions related to it in the Headquarters Hall.
					 A spokesman for the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association in a statement Wednesday said in this regard:
					
					 The search into the Korean school and the Headquarters Hall of Chongryon made by the Japanese reactionaries while talking about "illegal application" of employment subsidies is aimed at branding Chongryon as "illegal organization" and "criminal organization" at any cost to tarnish the image of Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK and, furthermore, obliterate Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are to blame for the brutal suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 By origin, the Japanese authorities are obliged to ensure and protect the democratic and national rights and interests of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan in light of how the issue of Koreans in Japan was spawned and requirement of international law.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries unhesitatingly commit terrorist act by mobilizing even the state power against the Koreans in Japan, not content with persecuting them, far from making an apology and reparation for the hair-raising crimes committed by Japan against the Korean nation in the past.
					
					 The searches into Chongryon organization and arrest of its officials and Koreans in Japan kicked off by the Japanese reactionaries in recent years are heinous inhuman crimes wantonly violating the declaration on rights of foreigners, the Havana convention on position of foreigners, the World Declaration of Human Rights and other international law.

articles.title: Japan Termed World's Worst Criminal State
articles.content:
Japan Termed World's Worst Criminal State
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Wednesday released a statement denouncing the Japanese reactionaries for becoming all the more pronounced in their fascist suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), a dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK.
					 The statement termed the unwarranted arrest of Chongryon officials and search into facilities related to Chongryon by the Japanese police as a grave politically-motivated provocation to block the righteous activities of Chongryon and stifle it.
					
					 This is aimed at obliterating Chongryon at any cost, justifying the "story about north's threat" and thus stepping up the moves for militarist reinvasion, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the unreasonable arrest of Chongryon officials and search into facilities related to Chongryon are being committed in full dress after the retrogressive revision of the "Japan-U.S. Defence Cooperation Guidelines" which calls for denying Japan's past history of aggression and legalizing its overseas aggression.
					
					 The reckless racket kicked off by Japan while pulling up Chongryon is, in essence, an expression of Japan's uneasiness as it is taken aback by the might of Songun Korea and its irritation at the thought that it may fail to realize its ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the persistent suppression of Chongryon is part of the Japanese reactionaries' planned and conspiratorial moves to chill the atmosphere of improving the north-south relations and realize their ambition, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The current case brought to light once again the fact that Japan is, indeed, the world's worst criminal state and most brutal war criminal state where democracy and humanitarianism are suffocated and national chauvinism is rampant.

articles.title: President of Maldives Wishes Korean People Success
articles.content:
President of Maldives Wishes Korean People Success
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kye Chun Yong, DPRK ambassador to Maldives, presented his credentials to Abdulla Yameen Abdul Gayoom, president of the Republic of Maldives, on September 3.
					 The president said that he was grateful to the Korean people for the material and moral support to the people of Maldives in the past.
					
					 He expressed hope that the two countries would boost mutual cooperation in the issues for economic development in the future, too.
					
					 Hoping that the tension would be defused on the Korean Peninsula and the peaceful reunification of Korea would be achieved, he wished the Korean people fresh successes in the struggle for building a powerful country and reunifying the country.

articles.title: Korean in Japan Praises Kim Il Sung's Feats
articles.content:
Korean in Japan Praises Kim Il Sung's Feats
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), who is leading a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 67th birthday of the DPRK was interviewed by KCNA Wednesday,
					 The history of the DPRK is the glorious one which provided its people with genuine life and happiness, recording proud successes in creation and construction under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great men, he said, and went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth the unique line of building people's power in the days of the anti-Japanese war and gained precious experience for implementing it.
					
					 On this basis, he founded the DPRK, genuine people's country, after liberation of Korea and declared the birth of Juche Korea to the whole world.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into the socialist state of Juche with invincible might.
					
					 His undying feats will be immortal.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il consolidated the DPRK to be a socialist fortress firmly guaranteeing the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and its eternal prosperity.
					
					 The DPRK is fully demonstrating its dignity and might under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the great leaders.
					
					 Hong called on officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan to make positive contribution to the patriotic work for the prosperity of the homeland, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Comes First at 2015 Asian Weightlifting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Comes First at 2015 Asian Weightlifting Championship
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifter Kim Myong Hyok came first in men's 69kg category weightlifting at the 2015 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					 The championship which kicked off in Thailand on September 6 brought together 170 men and women players from 30 countries and regions including the DPRK, Iran and Vietnam.
					
					 Kim Myong Hyok bagged three gold medals by placing first in total points on September 8. He finished first in both snatch and jerk in men's 69kg category weightlifting.
					
					 Another weightlifter Kwon Chang Il won a bronze medal in snatch event of men's 69kg category weightlifting on the same day.
					
					 Earlier, Sin Chol Bom came second in total points by finishing second in jerk and third in snatch in men's 62kg category weightlifting while Kim Su Ryon placed second in total points by finishing second in snatch and third in jerk in women's 53kg category weightlifting.
					
					 Paek Il Hwa placed second in jerk and third in snatch in women's 48kg category weightlifting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Associated with Birth of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Associated with Birth of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- With the birthday of the DPRK as an occasion, the Korean people recall the feats President Kim Il Sung performed to institute the name, flag and emblem of the country.
					 After Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, Kim Il Sung paid deep attention to instituting the name of the Republic soon to be founded.
					
					 He stressed that the name of the country should be instituted in keeping with its specific conditions, adding the main object and immediate task of the Korean revolution should be considered in the institution.
					
					He saw to it that the Juche character and the popular character were vividly reflected in the name of the country.
					
					 He also showed deep care for the institution of the national flag.
					
					 In early February Juche 37 (1948) he examined the design of the national flag and indicated the fundamental orientation of its designing, personally drawing the design.
					
					 And he said that the national flag should symbolize the bravery and heroism of the Korean people always advancing toward victory.
					
					 Then he guided the work to institute the national emblem, stressing that the emblem should mirror the unity of the broad masses of people based on the worker-peasant alliance as well as the nation's future development of modern industry and advanced agriculture.
					
					 Under such deep care and guidance of Kim Il Sung, the name of the country and its national flag and emblem came to being, displaying the spirit of Korea.

articles.title: Rosy Is Future of DPRK under Leadership of Kim Jong Un: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Rosy Is Future of DPRK under Leadership of Kim Jong Un: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is fully demonstrating its dignity and might and the future of the Korean people is rosy under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The imperialists are making desperate efforts to block the Korean people's road of independence, Songun and socialism but the prospect of the DPRK is rosy as the Juche idea and the Songun idea, the great guiding idea, indicates the road ahead of it.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have the honor and pride of holding Kim Jong Un, another brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, at the top posts of the party and state.
					
					 He clearly indicated the eternal strategy of the Korean revolution for advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and is leading to victory the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation with his outstanding strategy and immortal Songun leadership.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding and tested leadership the history and tradition of heroic Korea winning one victory after another are given steady continuity down through generations and the cause of building a thriving nation is making dynamic progress despite the ceaseless sanctions of the imperialist reactionaries to stifle the DPRK. This stirring reality of the DPRK instills conviction of the final victory of the revolution into all service persons and people.
					
					 The DPRK, the glorious motherland dashing ahead like the wind towards final victory, having Kim Jong Un at the helm of the revolution, will in the future, too, demonstrate its dignity as a country for the people always shedding its rays with the august names of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the future, too, the article concludes.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held by the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia and an enterprise and a hospital of Ethiopia and a lecture was given by a factory of Guinea on September 1 and 2 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The general chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said:
					
					 The Korean people could lead an independent and creative life as the master of the state as President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power and military power, enabling the Korean people to dynamically accelerate the building of a thriving nation despite the persistent moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that he was sincerely rejoiced over the fact that the Korean people are performing fresh miracles in the building of a thriving nation every day.
					
					 He expressed firm solidarity with the just struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 He fully supported the sincere efforts of the DPRK government to ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting in Cuba and friendship and joint meetings in Angola and Nigeria on August 31 and September 3 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said that President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, built a true socialist state in Korea through his total dedication and spared no effort to reunify the divided country independently and peacefully till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The director of the department of social education of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said that the President achieved the historic cause of the country's liberation, founded the DPRK where broad masses of people are the true master of the state and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised the President for founding the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East, defeating the U.S. imperialists' invasion and leading the postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction to victory.
					
					 A congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at an event held in Nigeria.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked in Switzerland
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Sep. 3 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung provided the most splendid and precious gift to the Korean people by founding the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on September 9, 1948.
					
					 Socialist Korea turned into a people's paradise under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who regarded believing in the people as in Heaven as their maxim.
					
					 The Korean-style socialist society based on the Juche idea brought all social benefits to the people. This is the only social system in the world.
					
					 The politics of love for the people brought single-minded unity of all service personnel and people rallied around the leader and this serves as invincible power and the powerful weapon for the DPRK.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Observe DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Observe DPRK's Birthday 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Wednesday in editorials say that the DPRK is an invincible power demonstrating its might as a powerful fortress of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of the great party. 
					 The DPRK is the Juche-oriented socialist state shedding its rays thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's original idea of nation-building and their immortal feats, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The President founded the DPRK on Sept. 9, Juche 37 (1948). This was an epochal event that marked a new origin of building the socialist state centered on the popular masses and a great auspicious event that provided a powerful political weapon for victoriously accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the peerlessly great man who glorified the DPRK as Kim Il Sung's Korea. Kim Jong Il's history of the revolutionary leadership is shining as a sacred course in which he ushered in a heyday of the era of the Workers' Party in all fields including politics, economy and culture under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 In the course of advance in the new century of Juche, the DPRK has demonstrated its dignity as the socialist power which no formidable enemy dares hurt under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is necessary to advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. Herein lie an eternal strategy of our revolution and final victory. This is the steadfast political faith of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 In the great era of Kim Jong Un the DPRK is shining as the promising country making a leap forward full of dynamism, the power of faith where the strong spirit of Paektu is running high and the socialist paradise where the people's dream and ideal are becoming realities.
					
					 It is the great pride of our army and people to live and make revolution in the great country shining with the august names of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, being blessed with the illustrious leaders.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the DPRK is Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea shining with their august names and an invincible socialist power demonstrating its might thanks to the idea and feats of the leaders.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes de partido y Estado de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes de partido y Estado de China
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, y el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Pak Pong Ju, recibieron un mensaje de felicitacion que les enviaran el dia 8 Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Li Keqiang, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado, y Zhang Dejiang, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la Republica Popular China. 
					El texto senala:
					
					Con motivo del 67o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC, enviamos en representacion del Partido Comunista de China, el gobierno y el pueblo chinos las calurosas felicitaciones y excelentes votos a ustedes y, por su conducto, al PTC, el gobierno y el pueblo coreanos.
					
					Durante los 67 anos que datan de la fundacion de la RPDC, el pueblo coreano alcanzo incesantes y nuevos exitos en la revolucion socialista y la causa de construccion bajo la direccion de los camaradas Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il y Kim Jong Un y del PTC.
					
					Nos regocijamos al respecto y deseamos de todo corazon que Corea logre un nuevo desarrollo en todas las labores futuras.
					
					China y Corea estan colindadas en montes y rios y la tradicional amistad China-Corea deviene una preciosa riqueza comun de ambas partes, preparada y cultivada por los lideres de generacion veterana de los dos paises.
					
					Bajo nuevas circunstancias, promoveremos junto con la parte coreana el desarrollo largo, sano y estable de las relaciones China-Corea, consolidaremos sin cesar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises y asi contribuiremos con teson a la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo de la region.
					
					Formulamos votos por el florecimiento y la prosperidad de la RPDC y la felicidad de su pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Con motivo del 67o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, le extiendo a Vd. mis sinceras felicitaciones. 
					
					Se desarrollan con rumbo constructivo las relaciones entre nuestros dos paises basadas en la excelente tradicion de amistad y buena vecindad. 
					
					Estoy seguro de que en el futuro tambien la cooperacion bilateral de beneficios mutuos se desarrollara en todos los dominios gracias a nuestros esfuerzos conjuntos. 
					
					Esto conviene a los intereses fundamentales de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises y contribuira al fomento de la seguridad y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Deseo a Vd. buena salud y exitos, y a todo el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, bienestar y prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dedicara el dia 9 el Presidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba, Raul Castro Ruz.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Estimado companero:
					
					En ocasion de celebrarse la Fiesta Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, extiendo nuestras mas calidas felicitaciones.
					
					Reciba un fraternal saludo.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden homenaje a martires al dia de fundacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a martires al dia de fundacion de RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 67o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fueron colocadas este miercoles las ofrendas florales ante el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong, el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la comuna Sinmi y el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Estaban colocadas alli las ofrendas florales enviadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					En las ceremonias de homenaje participaron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y otros trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron colocadas en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong las ofrendas florales a nombre del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, una ofrenda floral a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la comuna Sinmi, y la otra a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC en el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Ademas, fueron puestas las ofrendas florales a nombre del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del EPC y del ESIPC, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, salud publica, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, organismos del partido y el poder, instituciones, fabricas y granjas a nivel urbano, en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 67o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 9 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes lideres fueron depositados un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y el otros a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC.
					
					Los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y en los halles de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes y las otras de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por los grandes hombres hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas paras visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.
